ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors express their gratitude to the Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research of Tunisia. The authors dedicate this manuscript to the memory of Prof. Imen Said, who passed away on August 2016, for providing constant support to the characterization of plant essential oils using HS-SPME.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work received financial support from Tunisian Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research (Grant No. 11/TM06).

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data generated or analysed during this study are included in this published article.
